column4: does anyone happen to know the best workaround for older ati cards under feisty? rather than downgrade back to edgy i was wondering if it is at all possible to just downgrade X to 7.1 to make the 8.28 drivers which still have support for my card a possibility. apologies for repeat posting, im not doing it to garner attention just to restate for when osmeone has time.
and with 8.28 not supporting xorg 7.2 this is an issue :p

does anyone happen to know the best workaround for older ati cards under feisty? rather than downgrade back to edgy i was wondering if it is at all possible to just downgrade X to 7.1 to make the 8.28 drivers which still have support for my card a possibility. apologies for repeat posting, im not doing it to garner attention just to restate for when someone has time.
ati pulled support for 9250 and older cards in 8.35 drivers
so no 3-d for me unlessi go back to .28
is there no legacy package like for nvidia in fesity ?
I know its ati not nvidia, hence why I said is there not a legacy package LIKE the nvidia legacy package in fesity
I suspect many things are linked against the current xorg in fesity
I thought we'd discovered they are not supported
so whats the question then, if they are not supported, your out of luck
please keep your snark to yourself. i was asking a question aboute 'where to go from here' not for an explanation of a problem i understand
I'm not being Snakry (??) if the card isn't supported there is nothing you can do ???

???? what are you talking about. The card is not supported and not working. If you don't want to wait for ati to fix something - then your only other option is to go back to edgy as you said yourself - so there is nothing you can do
but your asking questions that are nothing to do with ubuntu - the ati drivers don't support it, question ati about it
you said yourself the card is not supported by ati - ubuntu can't change this, so your option is to use the "broke" ati driver or bo back to a working senario in edgy
its not an ubuntu isse, its the driver issue if its not up to your requirments
what do you expect though, you don't have a working driver ???? what do you expect people to do  ???
